title: Peppers stuffed with beef and tomatoes
ingredients: ['50g fresh wholemeal breadcrumbs', '4 large yellow peppers', '1 tbsp olive oil', '1 onion, finely chopped', '350g lean minced beef', '1 garlic clove, crushed', '200g can chopped tomatoes', '1 tbsp chopped fresh sage or 1 tsp dried', '1 tsp chopped fresh rosemary or Â½ tsp dried', '300ml vegetable stock, hot', '40g mature Cheddar cheese, grated', '2 fennel bulbs, cut into 5mm slices lengthways']
